city.name: Cape Town
city.description: I chose Cape town because it is a paradise full of exquisite scenery, it has beautiful beaches, two oceans (the icyAtlantic and the warmer Indian Ocean). Cape town is the Mother city that is unapologetic natural beauty

favouriteSubjects.name: Process Control
favouriteSubjects.description: Process control is the monitoring of a process to give a desired output, it is used to maintaion quality of a product and improve performance for example a simple process has a certain level of liquid in a tank, the process will be controlled by controlling the inlet flow rate

favouriteSubjects.name: Chemical engineering Laboratory
favouriteSubjects.description: These includes the analysis of chemical information, recording experiments details, analysing the data and writing a scientific report

favouriteSubjects.name: Process Design
favouriteSubjects.description: Process design is like brainstorming a process by simulating using COCO simulation or ASPEN, this helps to undestand the process proposed and how to improve it
